original_text: Behold, the Lord will cast her out, and he will smite her power in the sea; and she shall be devoured with fire.
korean_text: 주께서 그를 정복하시며 그의 권세를 바다에 쳐넣으시리니 그가 불에 삼켜질지라

sentences.original_text: the Lord will cast her out
and he will smite her power in the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 바다에서 그녀의 권세를 칠 것이요

sentences.original_text: and she shall be devoured with fire
